      • Senior Management
      Former Employee - Intern in Menlo Park, CA
      Former Employee - Intern in Menlo Park, CA
      Recommends
      Positive Outlook

      I worked at Andreessen Horowitz (Less than a year)

      Pros

      If you get an opportunity to work here, TAKE IT. Andreessen Horowitz is one of the best venture firms with a track record of success. People here are incredibly informed and insightful on tech trends and are always willing to have coffee chats with interns.

      Cons

      If you join here after college, don't expect to move up the ranks to GP - usually people leave after a few years for a portfolio company or to start their own company. (However, there have been a few exceptions to this recently, with the promotions of Angela Strange and Connie Chan.)

      Andreessen Horowitz 2019-01-02 13:15 PST

    Interviewing at Andreessen Horowitz

    1. Sep 24, 2014

      Helpful (3)  

      Pool Interview

      Anonymous Employee
      Accepted Offer
      Positive Experience
      Average Interview

      Application

      I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Andreessen Horowitz.

      Interview

      A woman just asked me questions about my resume and talked about their university intern pool program. She then connected me to A16Z's startup portfolio where I was interviewed by a bunch of startup companies.

      Interview Questions

      • What new technology on the market today do you think has the best chance of enormous success?   1 Answer
      Andreessen Horowitz 2014-09-24 17:56 PDT
